Key Match Events: Roland Sallai scored the opening goal for Hungary in the 32nd minute.
Virgil van Dijk was sent off in the 79th minute after receiving two yellow cards.
Denzel Dumfries equalized for the Netherlands in the 83rd minute with a header from a Gakpo cross.
Post-Match Reflections: Ronald Koeman's Netherlands needed a late goal from Denzel Dumfries to secure a point on the road at Hungary in the UEFA Nations League.
Liverpool’s Van Dijk will play no further part in this week’s international break after his sending-off.
Inter Milan full-back Denzel Dumfries took the armband off Van Dijk following his fellow defender’s dismissal and headed the equalizer in the 83rd minute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match ended in a 1-1 draw between Hungary and the Netherlands.
The match took place at the Puskas Arena in Budapest, Hungary.
